name: @ovh-ux/manager-documentation
description: Manager documentation deployed with GitHub Pages

scripts.docs:build: yarn docs:build:manager-components && node cli/prebuild.js &&  vitepress build --base /manager/
scripts.docs:build:manager-components: cd ../packages/manager-components && yarn build && rm -rf ../../docs/docs/public/storybook-static && mkdir -p ../../docs/docs/public/storybook-static && cp -r ./storybook-static/* ../../docs/docs/public/storybook-static
scripts.docs:deploy: yarn run docs:build && gh-pages -d .vitepress/dist -m "docs: update documentation [skip ci]"
